title: What the Lord Requires
summary: Deuteronomy 10 recalls how God renewed the covenant after Israel’s sin and gave Moses the second set of tablets. Moses urges the people to fear the Lord, walk in His ways, and serve Him with all their heart.

faq.question: What does God require of His people?
faq.answer: To fear Him, walk in His ways, love Him, and keep His commandments.

faq.question: What does this chapter reveal about God’s character?
faq.answer: He is mighty and just, yet also compassionate and loving, especially toward the vulnerable.
